Reviews.Title: “Friendly well kitted out hotel in good location”
Reviews.Author: icemandan
Reviews.Content: husband 2 teenage sons stayed full week july standard room pretty big matter time day left always came back clean room beds made fresh towels breakfast nice juice rolls muffins fruit bacon sausage biscuits microwave front staff friendly took full advantage shuttle universal used pool night pool towels gone either use towels room ask someone front desk anymore towels looking stay orlando would highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great choice with excellent location and tasteful design”
Reviews.Author: Carol S
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 7 nights standard room clean tidy upon arrival kept way whole time thanks polite cleaning staff never problems reception staff polite friendly helpfull location perfect us couple minutes walk idrive free shuttle universal seaworld always time free daily breakfast helped save us dollars set us hitting parks

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel, certainly worth the money”
Reviews.Author: Melissaberry
Reviews.Content: stayed fairfield suites international july 2006 hotel quite clean within walking distance resturants shops nice big pool hot tub area excellent breakfast buffet one hot day along cereal breads juices fruit etc downside hotel room old equipment shuttle universal sea world etc

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Staff, Fantastic Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Robert B
Reviews.Content: overnight stay impressed stay fairfield inn hotel great location although canada ave easy miss drive staff courteous attentive stay first impression room great standard room simple attractive larger stale clean enough towels linens bed pillows extremely comfortable one best night sleep ive hotel anywhere else definately stay hotel next trip

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel with friendly staff - above Paris standards”
Reviews.Author: Lulgiss
Reviews.Content: stayed fairfield inn king extended suite may 7 14 2006 found excellent choice front desk staff always professional friendly housekeeping staff good job keeping everything clean hotel occupied lot tended quiet loved pool area relaxing always lots fresh towels area kept clean continental breakfast morning adequate would certainly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “quirky, and great location”
Reviews.Author: amsW6
Reviews.Content: excellent service friendly staff clean recently rooms great breakfast day day stay includes fresh pastries sausage eggs etc cooked high standard free vending tea coffee night day great like us need hot tea hard day parks pool big clean hot outside spa refreshing staff seemed respect hotel guests front desk team couldnt enough help surprise us hotel seems lots business travellers downside property set back idrive youve got 5 minute walk get price worth paying quality fairfield inn one nice touch final day waiting taken airport reception staff offered us complimentary drinks snacks nice gesture well done marriot compared properties weve stayed orlando extremely proud

Reviews.Title: “good choice”
Reviews.Author: Pjay99
Reviews.Content: clean well located nice pool spa area room basic two double beds standard room clean comfortable free high speed internet access decent basic hotel breakfast friends staying across street quality suites thought basic room far superior

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel... but I wouldn't stay there again”
Reviews.Author: MarySP
Reviews.Content: functional economical view typical frankfurt

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location and very friendly staff”

Reviews.Content: go away horrible room cheap plastic rooms novotel hotels rated three stars hotels france novotel frankfurt provide service facilities novotel hotel france dont know hotel considered four stars hotel

Reviews.Title: “We loved it & we'll most definitely be back...!”

Reviews.Content: good value hotel hotel exactly one would expect 4 star chain hotel nice modern room friendly staff complaints

Reviews.Content: good business hotel stayed hotel times business frankfurt location excellent close office people location already go nothing close hotel even find decent restaurant bar walking distance restaurant hotel bar mostly empty luckily frankfurt good public transportation system relatively cheap taxis hence still reach downtown comfortably 15 minutes time hotel typical novotel mentioned could bit atmosphere rooms besides however complaints superior rooms good size clean bed cover pillows comfortable bathroom fine well staff friendly helpful would stay visiting frankfurt office trade show

Reviews.Title: “great hotel, great location”

Reviews.Content: stay novotel frankfurt city hotel quite new told hotel 4 star definitely hotel looked like 2 star room sense homely features bed uncomfortable cant sleep correctly definitely 3 star standing hotel agree previous review 1 january 2006 fact hotel hotel lacking character 7 hours flight wont stay hotel trust feel home definitely dont stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Place to stay if you want to be central”

Reviews.Content: problems comfortable free night included expedia hotel great value maybe lacking character little bit rooms spotless tastefully decorated even though right next train quiet windows tourist enjoyed stay much certainly geared towards business traveller

Reviews.Content: hotel stayed hotel business trip hotel im glad staying business id hate paid money holiday stay rooms clean homely features restaurant equally plain atmosphere room full business people sitting eating love travelling business means staying hotels like felt home two days definitely dont stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel - but unprofessional”

Reviews.Content: lovely hotel near jardin du luxembourg st germain area restaurants shopping nearby close rer train station direct cdg airport walking distance metro station room clean newly renovated bed extremely comfortable problem ground floor near reception could noisy times foot traffic esp high outside door avoid room hotel staff mostly friendly room rate resolved eventually aware single room 1 person website really meant 1 person even room 2 twin beds well fit 2 people charge 30 euros extra per person per night excessive

Reviews.Content: ive three times twice renovation one time impressed lovely boutique hotel done feel special staying decor beautiful lovely court charming renovated basement breakfast room modern clean large equally good bathrooms service great people helpful friendly also lovely area paris soon walk door beautiful paris walking distance pretty much best parts paris go overall probably cheapest place stay worth little extra get wonderful experience magical place stay place staying paris like

Reviews.Title: “A charming hotel in a fabulous location.”

Reviews.Content: travel three weeks month found hotel du luxembourg exceptional hotel clean recently comfortable importantly staff could helpful great value money close many great attractions loads good restaurants stay next stay paris

Reviews.Title: “Everything we wished for and more!!”

Reviews.Content: room quite huge high quality bed bathroom shower tub rooms double doors privacy given central location heard almost nothing even view fri nights nite french style breakfast dont expect much eat supposed evening simple coffee went days 1st day coffees en 2nd day 1 breakfast 1 coffee charged breakfast coffees extra wifi available though open

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Hotel in a Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Jasperoo
Reviews.Content: charming hotel fantastic base explore paris within walking distance eiffel tower notre dame doorstep plenty tourist less touristy restaurants nearby comfortable beds storage funky clothes rail desk useful room safe good clean bathroom large shower small grocery store road helpful negative room neighbours bathroom noises clearly us lift small sometimes night lights corridors didnt work slightly given steps reception staff pleasent helpful wed happily come back would recommend others

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good value”

Reviews.Content: took chance internet ratings like trip advisor overall good choice decent clean room little compact typical eu cities looks like recent renovation nice people front desk helped locate restaurants directed around terrible french speak english without complaint breakfast average europe bread yogurt ok price compared got street first day good location walking everywhere luxembourg park across street great first stop get early join going around park gave average basic luxury good place bed paris p

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely fantastic! Excellent price/quality ratio! Would recommend it highly!”
Reviews.Author: CLARAetFAMILLE
Reviews.Content: hotel nice beautiful rooms extremely well decorated staff courteous location good excellent breakfast included room rate expensive overpriced 14 euros per person couple breads 2 types cheese boiled eggs booked room 3 people got big spacious room ground floor first concern room big sky window didnt curtains surprisingly smallest problem room room right across room elevator people stopped chat waiting elevator night long making impossible get sleep problem room disabled people werent shower curtains bath shower next day asked transferred another room new room first floor much smaller although paid price beautiful well decorated bathroom nicer closed shower although didnt bath barely fitted 3 people another room could hear every single word said next room course didnt help loud italians small baby time location said good great well centrally located luxembourg garden university notre cathedral nearest subway station 34 blocks away know doesnt sound bad ive stayed cheaper hotels paris subway station around corner one little disappointing main issue reason wouldnt go back really noisy rooms

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great staff, wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: nrusso
Reviews.Content: late days paris wide street tall french windows breakfast served bed luxembourg garden hundreds heavy metal chairs green couple steps away thank rest stay city cities

Reviews.Title: “A clean comfortable secure welcoming haven”
Reviews.Author: Willowbee2
Reviews.Content: gem fabulous position close major attractions quiet elegant rooms quite spacious paris decor gorgeous staff friendly helpful outstanding service perfect hotel wheelchair travellers sure request room two

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL WHEELCHAIR ACCESSIBLE”
Reviews.Author: jandb22
Reviews.Content: lets get negative way first room tiny paris put luggage bed make room walk room however well furnished clean throughout towels thin shower excellent impressed level service provided reception staff especially manager day gave us lot recommendations booking show even saved us 40 euros charging helped booked us one breakfast hotel thought rip charge 14 euros per person didnt choice due early morning upon checkout surprised delighted young lady reception really nice said worry wont charge us breakfast nice gesture grateful location hotel fantastic really nice bistro doors away corner serves best steak home made would love walking distance many attractions nearest metro station rue le make better would probably stay get larger room next time

Reviews.Title: “Really great hotel, perfect location”
Reviews.Author: sunrisecarib
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel four friends weekend paris marathon excellent base view city hotel small charming feel decorated contemporary style pretty bedrooms luxurious bathrooms two adjoining rooms king sized beds bed provided 5th guest rooms spotless staff friendly helpful restaurant bar hotel heart latin quarter restaurants cater tastes doorstep also short walk luxembourg metro station adjoining park

Reviews.Title: “Great neighborhood, probably won't stay again.”
Reviews.Author: trvl09
Reviews.Content: stylish hotel comfortable quiet close 1015 minutes walk notre dame room quite small think expected france generally bathroom well shower curtain wet floor every time shower tea making facilities room probably expected didnt sample breakfast per head rather turn right hotel door walk cafe corner sit opposite palace du luxembourg watch world go enjoy coffee croissant spent 3 comfortable nights relaxing environment close nice small restaurants try around corner authentic french dining experience apparently accepted credit cards since take cash would recommend hotel reasonably priced place stay convenient major areas

Reviews.Title: “Great Location to Explore Paris”
Reviews.Author: ClaireJessica
Reviews.Content: hotel good location breakfast good nice waiter bed firm effective good blackout curtains room lighting colours style many contemporary boutique hotels dim lighting meant poor inconvenient despite menu room phoned reception request hot drink told one available provide paid superior room small however water pressure compact shower cubicle good bath towels thin place put luggage proper wardrobe open hangers travelling lot luggage even two suitcases would difficult find space put one bed table window wanted open window move table luggage rack probably absolutely space overall disappointing cramped paid superior expected little space despite fact hotel rooms paris small

Reviews.Title: “Good location to explore Paris.”
Reviews.Author: californiafamily2010
Reviews.Content: travelled low season paris got rather good rate bookingcom hotel close enough luxembourg rer station straight cdg airport however finding hotel little bit especially rainy day quiet side street history hotel deciding book disappointed room small usual heart paris interesting original thick old wooden beams top floor see attached picture staff concern us since didnt need much everything straight forward free wifi room perfect would need get password reception every piece equipment overall good stay paris except rainy weather

Reviews.Title: “What a Wonderful Experience ... Would Definitely Return”
Reviews.Author: MoppelOhio
Reviews.Content: selected hotel based tripadvisor paris travel guide mentioning budget hotels disappointed upon booking charged small deposit checkout simple charged price even though upgraded room accommodate guests location good want little beaten path 15 minute walk notre dame nice cafes restaurants along way great little convenience store right across street got 2 water bottles 23 reception staff friendly helpful breakfast since expensive right street elevator really tiny two suitcases one person maximum internet wifi connection free worked fine beds pillows great comfortable wife problem sleeping walls thin like hotels stay foreign also upgraded room maid closet right outside door staff extremely noisy one night though great hotel experience would stay

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel & Great Location”
Reviews.Author: NurseGirl76
Reviews.Content: nice small hotel wonderful neighborhood easy walk shops restaurants close rer stations bus stops block luxembourg gardens room bathroom good size paris problem lighting room great hard see since lighting didnt really job situation bathroom good continental breakfast working front desk helpful knowledgeable

Reviews.Title: “Not what I hoped for.”
Reviews.Author: Schleins Girl
Reviews.Content: took girlfriends trip europe 2 friends 30th birthday pleasantly surprised beautiful inside tiny elevator fit one us suitcase time fortunately second floor took steps lot got one smaller narrow rooms 2 twin beds separated rollaway bed also brought 3 girls lots stuff tight figured paris didnt plan spending much time room three beds comfy though room beautiful bathroom nice shower great didnt hear guests lobby always peaceful window room huge faced street opened let nice breeze consequently hearing neighborhood drunk liked buildings outside passed sidewalk although tried avoid walking found quite liked location hotel could walk almost anywhere needed proximity jardin du luxembourg notre dame louvre subway great ate bistros picked quick bites patisserie market across street 4 people front desk 3 really great helpful would point us possible places eat help us set excursions tourist office one guy didnt seem understand much english three us tried speak broken french make much effort could didnt want rude americans stay hotel great one stayed offered free wifi bonus 4 cities visited id say hotel european one loved despite smallest room stayed

Reviews.Title: “Perfect spot to stay in Paris”
Reviews.Author: hatstand1
Reviews.Content: hotel general view nice rooms bit small clean comfortable location great close luxembourg parc reached via rer b directly cdg real downside price room changed sat sun even though fixed price comment discussion care shame otherwise hotel nice check prices get careful

Reviews.Title: “secret place in Paris”
Reviews.Author: smos
Reviews.Content: cannot beat block left bank seine enjoy shopping great little restaurants galleries outside door rooms small bathrooms well appointed room opened inner courtyard quiet closet would nice hotel staff varied greatly two 3 dealt fantastic knowledgable helpful third worked sunday daytime help local area even work hotel coffee machine poor training negative total lack television stations cable tv rooms 20 french bbc cnn tip take rer cdg st station 2 blocks hotel save taxi fare might even save time also 20 feet front door hotel cute fab little louis book seat dinner youll find bargain terrific local french try

Reviews.Title: “believe the hype”
Reviews.Author: Percy13
Reviews.Content: nicely appointed rooms staff however booked double superior room directly hotel requesting quiet room away elevator accepted reservation deliver room middle hotel lobby next elevator stairs hardly requested asking quiet room room standard double cost 70 less 2 night stay unfortunately refused provide checkout saying person first email went phoned said could nothing bill paid talk money gone long offer discount next visit ready give money advice dont stay room dont trust

Reviews.Title: “Fab location - minuscule room”
Reviews.Author: onholiday1o1
Reviews.Content: excellent location quiet clean beautifully decorated hotel standard rooms little bit smaller us nice space sufficient two people room superior rooms larger comparable us hotels rooms staff nice help shops cafes close subway stations 510 min walking beautiful luxembourg garden 2 min walking distance many sightseeing sites close like walking majority main sightseeing places central part paris walking distance would nice rooms dont typical europe entire stay absolutely positive

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel!!!!”
Reviews.Author: HeikeWien
Reviews.Content: couldnt happier decision stay hotel du luxembourg hotel fantastic location near luxembourg gardens boulevard st near metro stops walking distance attractions notre dame beautifully renovated room pretty bathroom large european hotel hotel offer breakfast rather expensive anything special tons cafes nearby try instead staff helpful calling dinner reservations us favorite place dinner au louis steps hotel also nice convenience store right across street snacks water would happily stay

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and Clean Hotel”

Reviews.Content: choose stay lovely hotel disappointed everything simply excellent price really delivered excellent location could see corner luxembourg gardens window fairly quiet location double glazed windows perfect good nights sleep decor crisp clean interesting huge behind bed bed bit hard liking partner loved bed crisp white linens sleep comfortable pillows delight places trip bathroom lovely enormous bath fitted us lovely clean tiles nice little grocery shop directly road pastry shop around corner excellent little wine bar corner top street sophisticated noisy fabulous restaurant right next door ate hardly tourists food beautiful french reasonably priced 3 courses 2 persons plus drinks euros staff always helpful polite room basic double excellent size big enough us trip 2 large suitcases bathroom enormous european standards rooms cleaned good condition appears new refurbishment loved stay definitely return next visit cannot recommend highly enough walked everywhere could get home metro plus free wifi bonus difficult use rooms book hotel regret

Reviews.Title: “Terrific hotel and excellent value”

Reviews.Content: husband says hotel ruined europe never happy nothing lives standard hotel du rooms small arent always europe beautifully appointed bathrooms gorgeous good showers important holidays bed soft perfect good nights sleep around paris rooms quiet staff friendly helped taxis back airport well really good restaurant reservations cannot recommend hotel enough great place stay paris

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in a wonderful location”
Reviews.Author: Nomad_london123
Reviews.Content: stay pleasant although wouldnt give hotel others little quirky nice bathrobes one soap big comfortable bed extremely poor bedside lighting excellent concierges week grumpy unhelpful ones weekend nice coffee bar lobby overpriced 3 euros single espresso mediocre cold breakfast 14 euros poor value better go cafes around corner one hint instead booking online program sent email directly hotel got prompt courteous response better rate posted location fabulous block luxembourg gardens block less ten minutes walk seine prices reasonable across street easily buy soap bottled water hotel enjoyed stay probably wont make list

Reviews.Title: “Unique & very nice”
Reviews.Author: ibeenthereandthere
Reviews.Content: back stay du luxembourg extraordinary place gorgeous spacious rooms bathrooms wellequipped comfortable extremely clean really well located steps away des latin quarter jardin du luxembourg courteous friendly staff stay family room perfect family two separate bedrooms although connecting large bathroom one shower one bath 8 18 year old sons connecting room husband felt extremely comfortable closeby yet separate room highly recommend beautiful property

Reviews.Title: “what a value!”
Reviews.Author: flfishinchick
Reviews.Content: partner stayed hotel two nights may thoroughly enjoyed location great close luxembourg gardens metro station rooms clean stylish bathrooms excellent problems water temperature pressure breakfast great fruit salad cereal cold meats bread cheese coffee tea staff incredibly helpful polite first night helped us rouge booking last night found lovely restaurant us within walking distance highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Paris - we love you!”

Reviews.Content: first bad news rooms small side therefore little space find big problem others may disagree staff friendly welcoming helpful efficient hotel spotless beds comfortable bathrooms excellent well supplied hotel peaceful lounge comfortable place relax thing would make hotel perfect would small fridge room one ground floor kitchen use location perfect luxembourg gardens minute away plenty places eat drink etc including small supermarket directly opposite front door coming paris come
